title: Iranian Nobel laureate handed further prison sentence, lawyer says
summary_full: Narges Mohammadi was arrested in December for making "provocative remarks" at a memorial, where she was also reportedly beaten.
summary_public: Narges Mohammadi was arrested in December for making "provocative remarks" at a memorial, where she was also reportedly beaten.

IR.label: negative
